org.eclipse.persistence.json.bind.internal.serializer

Class AdaptedObjectSerializer<T,A>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.persistence.json.bind.internal.serializer.AdaptedObjectSerializer<T,A>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.json.bind.serializer.JsonbSerializer<T>, RuntimeTypeInfo, CurrentItem<T>

    public class AdaptedObjectSerializer<T,A>
extends java.lang.Object
implements CurrentItem<T>, javax.json.bind.serializer.JsonbSerializer<T>
    Serializer for adapted object. Converts object using adapter first, than seriazizes result with standard process.
